searchQuery.query:
source logs last 6h
| filter $l.subsystemname == 'product-catalog' && productId_enriched.category!=''
| filter productId_enriched.price_in_currency:num > 0
| create Trans_usd from 
  case_equals {
        productId_enriched.currency,
        'USD'   -> productId_enriched.price_in_currency:num * 1,
        'EUR'   -> productId_enriched.price_in_currency:num * 1.04,
        'JPY'   -> productId_enriched.price_in_currency:num * 0.0066,
        'CAD'   -> productId_enriched.price_in_currency:num * 0.69}
| groupby $m.timestamp/1h as Time, productId_enriched.category as Categories agg 
    count() as Transactions, 
    `${round(sum(Trans_usd),2)}` as Total_Revenue,
    `${round(avg(Trans_usd),2)}` as Avg_Revenue
| orderby Time
